name: GolfDrivers (revolversi)
description:
A fast paced drive and shoot game, with procedural generation, enemies and beer.  Are you fit to survive as long as possible?

In the game you are a driver running away from the police with your car, you can also pick up beers on your way, they make you faster but they also have a downside: your vision is altered and you have problems handling the steering wheel.

The world is an infinite forest, generated around you, so you must be careful while driving so fast.
